title: Screener Credentials Schema
description: Schema for encrypted screener_api.json.enc credentials file storing API credentials indexed by provider number.

^SCREENER_NAME_\\d{2}$.description: Human-readable name or label of the screener source/provider.

^SCREENER_USERNAME_\\d{2}$.description: Optional username for screener provider API authentication.

^SCREENER_PASSWORD_\\d{2}$.description: Optional password for screener provider API authentication.

^SCREENER_URL_\\d{2}$.description: Optional base URL for the screener API endpoint.

^SCREENER_API_KEY_\\d{2}$.description: API key/token for the screener provider.

^SCREENER_TOKEN_\\d{2}$.description: Optional authentication token for the screener provider.

^USE_FOR_UNIVERSE_\\d{2}$.description: Flag indicating if this provider is used for building the symbol universe.

^USE_FOR_ANALYSIS_\\d{2}$.description: Flag indicating if this provider is used for analysis.

^USE_FOR_TRADING_\\d{2}$.description: Flag indicating if this provider is used for trading.

^USE_FOR_MONITORING_\\d{2}$.description: Flag indicating if this provider is used for monitoring.
